content.title: Cogan Syndrome
content.description: Rare inflammatory disorder characterized by interstitial keratitis and vestibuloauditory dysfunction with variable vessel vasculitis.

vascular_complications.aortic_involvement: May require aortic valve replacement or aortic surgery

treatment.surgical: For aortic aneurysm or significant regurgitation

content.clinical_pearl: Consider Cogan in young patient with aortitis plus audiovestibular symptoms
